title: Project Management Training
expanded_description: Join our upcoming project management classes for to learn how you can utilize project management to meet users and business needs
description: For beginners who are looking to start a career in project management or for intermediate who are looking to sharpen their project management skills alike.

answer: Anyone looking to build a successful career in project management.

Anyone who is interested in taking the Project Management Professional (PMP), the Certified Associate in Project Management (CAPM), or the Agile Certified Practitioner (PMI-ACP) certification examinations

requirements.how: This course will be taught via videoconference using:

payment.order_summary: This course is designed to equip project managers and entrepreneurs with profitable roadmaps and resources to start, scale and champion their project management careers. It will be taught via online live classes and recordings will be provided 3-5 hours after the class for those who missed it. You could enroll for weekday classes or weekend classes.

curriculum.topic: Introduction To Project Management & The Predictive Approach (Project Management Plan)
The Predictive Approach (Project Management Plan, Excecution, Monitoring and Control)
The Predictive Approach (Project Closure, Monitoring and Control) & The Agile Approach (Introduction, Integration, Project Excecution)
The Agile Approach (Project Execution, Product Release To Operations) & Next Steps

training_only.name: Training only
training_only.payment_description: For individuals who wish to be trained only
extra_details: Explanation of exam questions and answers

training_with_mentorship.name: Training & Mentoring
training_with_mentorship.payment_description: For individuals who wish to be trained and mentored
extra_details: Explanation of exam questions and answers
Training on the use of some popular PM software
Opportunity to connect with like-minded professionals
Regular attention to real world issues on projects
